name: Pendant Kit Black Cord
description:
Want to make that lampshade or found object into a swag light and the only thing available is plastic cords and flimsy sockets? I have the solution for you.

Note: a Pendant is a hanging light that is hard-wired into an electrical source. If you want a plug-in hanging fixture, choose the Swag style instead. 

For my Cloth Cord Light Kits I’ve chosen the same high-quality materials and components that I use in my own high-end creations. 
All the kits are assembled-to-order here in my workshop studio in Pine Plains, N.Y.

You have the choice of ten colors of beautiful twisted cord: red, blue, brown, green, putty, ivory, black, silver, gold and copper. 
Measure how long you need the wire to be and all will arrive ready for you to let your creativity go wild.


Measure how long you need the wire to be and all will arrive ready for you to let your creativity go wild.

This listing is for a "Cloth Cord Pendant Light Kit" with black cord, you can choose between nickel, brass and antique brass hardware. 

What you get:

Porcelain socket wired to your cord. Choose your cord length and you are good to go.
Canopy and hardware for hard wire installation.


A word about wattage!!!!!!
I DO NOT KNOW WHAT YOU ARE HANGING, SO WITH THAT SAID I WILL CAUTION YOU TO USE A 40WATT MAX BULB.  THE SMALLER THE OBJECT TO BE HUNG, THE SMALLER THE WATTAGE.

Enjoy creating.

Susan

Bulbs are sold separately. 

Kits are shipped in 7-10 business days.

Click through the pictures to see your choices.

name: Single Copper Leaf Pendant
description:
I came across a box of vintage army surplus enamel pendants. The outside green is a beautiful olive.  Unfortunately the underneath enamel was in bad shape on most of them. What to do??
 I secretly have an obsession with all kinds of metal leaf, as well as copper in general.
Went to my box of metal leaf and pulled out copper.  I gilded the inside of the pendants and they came out fabulous.  I used a vintage style bulb to get that warm glow from the copper. I did NOT seal the copper, so in time (does not take long) the copper with begin to age and change color.  If you want the copper to stay bright, I can seal it for you.
This listing is for a SINGLE pendant.  Putty cord, 36". Bulbs are NOT included.
The pendants are 12" across, 7" tall.

Comes with a copper canopy and hardware for hanging.

These fixtures can be custom sized to your needs, just let me know.

Recomended watts 75

name: Half Shades, Colorful Florentine and Leaves
description:
What better way to add some color, than with some half shades for your sconces.  Here are two styles of shades with two styles of papers.

Florentine scrolls, classic for any decor.  These come in three colors in a shield shape. Trimmed with coordinating ribbon.  Shields measure
 4 X 4  X 4  - Half round for wall fixture.

Leaves on handmade paper, a little whimsy with a classical twist.  Three colors, pink is my favorite as it seems to be the color of 2011.
Trimmed with coordinating ribbon.
4 X 4 1/4 X 4 1/4 - Half round for wall fixture.

name: Red Cardinal Matchbox
description:
As a hostess gift, they will last longer than a bottle of wine or a box of cookies, and our large collection of styles—each drawn from our unrivaled 30-year collection of vintage imagery—would match any décor.

Each box has a wood top covered with a bold graphic paper that is decoupaged, and the corners are fitted by hand with copper tape. All of the materials are made in the USA except for the ink that is used for printing, and our final products are also created here in our historic Hudson Valley, NY, studios.

House Beautiful called these "The Best" Nov 2010.

If there is an image you are looking for, let me know.  Shandell's image library is huge. We will find what you are looking for.  

Each box of matches has a different image on each side.

When empty, just refill with kitchen matches.


Click on each picture to see the images.

name: Amaryllis Tissue Box
description:
Everyone has those horrible boxes of the much-needed tissues hanging around the house. Well, I couldn’t take looking at them any longer. With all of the vintage cool stuff I have, I came up with a great solution: cover them up, and make them something to smile about.

I decoupage the vintage images on a wooden tissue box cover, and trim it in copper. Each one is handmade by me, signed and dated.

These boxes fit the standard square tissues that you get in the market.

name: Swag Kit BLACK Cord
description:
Want to make that lampshade or found object into a swag light and the only thing available is plastic cords and flimsy sockets? I have the solution for you.

Note: a Swag is a hanging light that is plugs into an electrical socket. If you want a hard-wired hanging fixture, choose the Pendant style instead.

For my Cloth Cord Light Kits I’ve chosen the same high-quality materials and components that I use in my own high-end creations. 
All the kits are assembled-to-order here in my workshop studio in Pine Plains, N.Y.

You have the choice of ten colors of beautiful twisted cord: red, blue, brown, green, putty, ivory, black, silver, gold and copper. 
Measure how long you need the wire to be and all will arrive ready for you to let your creativity go wild.

Susan

name: Double Copper Leaf Pendant
description:
I came across a box of vintage army surplus enamel pendants. The outside green is a beautiful olive.  Unfortunately the underneath enamel was in bad shape on most of them. What to do??
 I secretly have an obsession with all kinds of metal leaf, as well as copper in general.
Went to my box of metal leaf and pulled out copper.  I gilded the inside of the pendants and they came out fabulous.  I used a vintage style bulb to get that warm glow from the copper. I did NOT seal the copper, so in time (does not take long) the copper with begin to age and change color.  If you want the copper to stay bright, I can seal it for you.
This listing is for a double pendant; each pendant hangs off of a copper pipe.  The vintage style cord is used as an accent.  Bulbs are NOT included.
Measurements 31” wide,  36” drop from the ceiling, each pendant is 12” across.
Comes with a copper canopy and hardware for hanging.
These fixtures can be custom sized to your needs, just let me know.
Recomended watts 75

I have found a box of vintage battery jars, yes glass jars were used for batteries.  They were used as early as the 1860's.
Love the color and shape, I decided to showcase them as pendants, with vintage chain.

name: F1900 Horseshoe 40 watt Reproduction Vintage Style Light Bulb
description:
FerroWatt was founded in late 19th century Vienna, Austria under the name "Watt AG".  The light bulb manufacturing company prospered into the 1930's rivaling such large manufacturers as Osram and Philips. 

Authentically detailed exactly like the 1880 original invented by Thomas Alva Edison, these bulbs are authentic right down to their looped carbon filaments and hand-exhausted tips. They are the best authentic reproduction carbon filament lamps available today.  FerroWatt’s light bulbs are perfect for any of your Cloth Cord kit projects.

This bulb is  40 watt     Dimensions: 2.25" x 5.25"



They are made using the original molds used in the early 1900's and assembled by hand.   Modern incandescent lamps use a tungsten filament, introduced after 1906, which produces a whiter light than the lovely, warm glow of an authentic carbon filament.  These bulbs put out less lumens than modern bulbs of an equivalent wattage, and significantly more heat.  The higher wattage bulbs look fabulous dimmed down a bit, to really show off the filament shape.  Ferrowatt bulbs have an average life of 2,500 user hrs.

Bulbs are shipped Priority Mail.

Note: a Pendant is a hanging light that is hard-wired into an electrical source. If you want a plug-in hanging fixture, choose the Swag style instead. 

For my Cloth Cord Light Kits, I’ve chosen the same high-quality materials and components that I use in my own high-end creations. This delicious cloth cord is Made in the U.S., and all the kits are assembled-to-order here in my workshop studio in Millerton, N.Y.

Choose from four colors of beautiful twisted cord: red, grey, gold and brown.

Measure how long you need the wire to be and all will arrive ready for you to let your creativity go wild.

This listing is for a "Cloth Cord Pendant Light Kit" with a nickel canopy.

What you get:
A zinc lid with a porcelain socket wired to your cord. Comes with 24" of cord, there are more options for different lengths. Just screw it on to your jar.
Canopy and hardware for hard wire installation. 
A 40 watt torpedo bulb.

A word about wattage!!!!!!
I DO NOT RECOMMEND ANY HIGHER WATTAGE THAN 40 WATTS FOR THE BALL JARS. 

Enjoy creating.

Susan

Kits are shipped in 7-10 business days.

Click through the pictures to see your choices.
